body:
Sign-up link to spack slack channel leads to a page where some App error is reported. It seems sign-up thing is broken.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Click on 'Sign-Up here' link under Slack Channel section of main README.md

### Information on your system

Firefox 57.0.1, Chrome 63.0, Linux Mint 18.2
title: Slack channel sign-up app error
